timelineManager.controller

Class AbstractController

  • java.lang.Object
    • timelineManager.controller.AbstractController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddTaskController, AddTimelineController, EditTaskController, EditTimelineController, HelpManualController, MainWindowController, MoveTimelineController

    public abstract class AbstractController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract controller which is a parent to all controllers in the timeline manager application. Since it holds a ModelAcess, TimelineViewer and DateViewer all inherited classes will have the access to the same variables.

      • AbstractController

        public AbstractController(ModelAccess modelAccess,
                          TimelineViewer timelineViewer,
                          javafx.scene.control.TableView<Timeline> timelineTable,
                          DateViewer dateViewer)
        Constructor for the Abstract Controller
        Parameters:
        modelAccess - The model access of the Timeline Manager
        timelineViewer - The timelineViewer that shows all Timelines and tasks on the main window
        timelineTable - The timelineTable which shows all timelines as a list on the main window
        dateViewer - The dateviewer that shows all dates in the main window
